original_title: Les Shadoks et la maladie mystérieuse
overview: For the Shadoks, panic strikes. A mysterious disease infects these curious creatures. Everyone talks about it, giving their various opinions, but all discussions lead to fighting. They used to spend their time enjoying, now it’s just a constant brawl. Professor Shadoko prepares a vaccination against this terrible disease.
title: Les Shadoks et la maladie mystérieuse
